unavailable_msg:
The door is locked...
There's a note: "I'm on vacation right now, please come back later! Thank you!"
first_dialog: Hi! You're my neighbor's kid, right? Do you need anything?
first_job_offer: Oh, thank you! My lawn does need a trim - I just got back from a vacation to Aldoria and I don't feel like mowing my lawn. My flowers haven't been watered so they're a little upset right now...
